Title: Enacts the accelerate solar for affordable power (ASAP) act
Summary: Enacts the accelerate solar for affordable power (ASAP) act to set a new target for distributed solar energy capacity and direct the public service commission to advance reforms to the utility interconnection process to ensure timely and cost-effective integration of new distributed energy resources.
LawCode: Amd ยง75-0103, En Con L; add ยง66-x, amd ยง66-j, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the public service law, in relation to enacting the accelerate solar for affordable power (ASAP) act
